src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pāc.45. yo punabhikṣu bhikṣūnevaṃ vadeya tathāhamāyuṣmānto bhagavatā dharmmandeśitamājānāmi
yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tānpratisevato vā nālamantarāyāya /
ukṣipitavyo imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya ukṣepaṇa pācattikam //

PrMoSū(Mā)_Pāc.46. yo puna bhikṣurjānanbhikṣu tathā ukṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa  vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathā kāritāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ apratinissaraṇaṃ taṃ akṛtānudharmmaṃ  sabhuṃjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāmvā kalpeya pācattikam /
